The goal of `bankdatr` is to provide an easy collection of bulk open bank data 
from US regulatory agencies.


## Installation
`bankdatr` is not available from CRAN yet. In the meantime, you can install the development version of bankdatr from Github:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("eauleaf/bankdatr")
```
